snipping tool.data: The Snipping Tool has been replaced with the Screenshot tool.

screenshot.data:
The easiest way to access the screenshot tool is to go into the Utility menu, and picking Take Screenshot.

There are also other ways. The PRINTSCREEN key will allow you to select a region of your screen to capture; SHIFT-PRINTSCREEN will capture the whole thing. All methods will end up with a saved file, and the PRINTSCREEN method will also copy it to your clipboard.
